state.VS: discarded - work was on the list (A)
state.VN: discarded - the work was on the draft list (PA)

tooltip.undefined: unclassified - the work is not included in the List, it is freely available for proposal for inclusion
tooltip.PA: work published as Proposal for inclusion in the list, it runs for 6 months until reassignment to status A
tooltip.A: included - the work is included in the List and has assigned licenses for use. In the case of the digital version, a link to the work in a Kramerius digital library (DK) is available
tooltip.VS: discarded - the work was on List (A), but is discarded; the work may be subject to NZN or administrative corrections
tooltip.VN: discarded - the work was on the Draft List (PA), but is discarded; the work may be subject to NZN or administrative corrections
tooltip.N: unclassified - the work is not included in the List, it is freely available for proposal for inclusion
tooltip.NZN: proposal for inclusion in the Draft List (internal state of administration)
tooltip.VVN: request for exclusion from the List Design (internal state of administration)
tooltip.VVS: request to be removed from the List (internal state of administration)
